sent.orig: High quality paring knife, utility knife and chef's knife. Direct import from Korea.
sent.trans: 韩国直接入口，高级果刀，多用途小刀，厨师刀。

sent.orig: Specification: Single-knife rubber bale cutter double-knife rubber produce line, ten-knife rubber bale cutter.
sent.trans: 单刀双缸切胶机；试验室用单缸切胶机；双刀切胶生产联动线；十刃切胶机。

sent.orig: Fish knife, positioned to the right of the meat knife.
Therefore, they stop by a knife factory, since having a knife represents manhood2 to the Uygur.
sent.trans: 因此他们顺路参访制刀厂，这是因为刀子对维吾尔族人来说象徵著男子气概。

sent.orig: Fish knife: in place of dinner or steak knife when fish is served.
sent.trans: 食鱼刀：吃鱼的时辰用来替换餐刀和牛肉片刀的。
